Description: Cancer care has historically been delivered in hospitals and clinics. In line with national trends to move care out of health care facilities into communities and homes, there are a growing number of models for moving cancer care to the home. Join us for a lively and provocative discussion about the future of cancer care delivery â€“ including  implications for drug development and research - with three thought leaders who have pioneered cancer care in the home.

Title: Why Cancer Care at Home is Here to Stay: Implications for Care Delivery, Drug Development, and Research
